name: scatter_prior
text: Here we can see samples generated by a gaussian process with a certain covariance function (with a periodic kernel, but that doesn't matter now). Before being observed, these samples reflect the model's uncertainty about the function's values at each point in the input space.

name: linear_prior
text: Like before, the points are sampled from a gaussian process. If we get an increasingly higher number of points, we can imagine those as a sample not only from a collection of random variables, but from random function.
